title: MathArtStream 6 ~ Dementors, Animagus and Episodic Memory: an Active Inference exploration (part 1)
description:
"Dementors, Animagus and Episodic Memory: an Active Inference exploration of “Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban"
Shanna Dobson, Héctor Manrique
In this talk, we will discuss Dementors and Animagus from the perspectives of episodic memory, autopoiesis, morphogenesis, and self-confirmation. This talk is Part 1 of our new streaming series exploring Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban from the formalism of Active Inference. 

Active Inference Institute information: 
Website: https://activeinference.org/
